channel.title: I really need help
channel.description: ok, so i went thru the whole thing on making ur server, but when i right click on project 16 i dont see anything with "run&compile"...what do i do? how do i log onto my own server...? HELP !!!

item.title: I really need help
item.dc:creator: @animalnt animalnt
item.description:
@animalnt wrote:

make a new text file>call it compile.bat (extension must be on)
and add this to the text file:

@echo off
COLOR 08
title Martinscape Client
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m server
pause

now change those paths to the correct location but must have them leading to there .exe files!

Hope that works lmao
Animalnt

Read full topic
